client.models.config 源代码

# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
"""
@File        : config.py
@Author      : liuda
@Time        : 2022/3/28 10:48
@Description :
"""
from django.db import models

from client.models.base import BaseModel



[文档]class Config(BaseModel):
    name = models.CharField(
        max_length=255,
        verbose_name="配置项目名称"
    )
    code = models.CharField(
        max_length=255,
        unique=True,
        verbose_name="配置的英文编码，前端作为请求参数"
    )
    value = models.TextField(
        verbose_name="值"
    )
    value_type = models.CharField(
        max_length=20,
        verbose_name="值类型"
    )
    is_deleted = models.BooleanField(
        default=False,
        verbose_name="是否已经被删除，默认未删除"
    )

    class Meta:
        db_table = "config"
        verbose_name = "配置文件"
